publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-892 Pauline McNeill: Saltmarket Centenary—That the Parliament notes that the Saltmarket area in Glasgow Kelvin will celebrate its 100th birthday in 2002; further notes that the Glasgow Cross Tenants and Residents Association are planning activities for the centenary, and expresses its commitment to regenerating inner city areas such as Saltmarket to ensure a quality life for local people so that ordinary people continue to live in city centres and not just shop there.
S1M-892 Saltmarket Centenary (lodged on 22 May 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-892 Pauline McNeill: Saltmarket Centenary—That the Parliament notes that the Saltmarket area in Glasgow Kelvin will celebrate its 100th birthday in 2002; further notes that the Glasgow Cross Tenants and Residents Association are planning activities for the centenary, and expresses its commitment to regenerating inner city areas such as Saltmarket to ensure a quality life for local people so that ordinary people continue to live in city centres and not just shop there. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell*
S1M-892 Saltmarket Centenary (lodged on 22 May 2000) Ms Sandra White*, Andrew Wilson*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Rhoda Grant*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-892 Saltmarket Centenary (lodged on 22 May 2000) Alex Neil*, Mr Michael McMahon*

S1M-892 Pauline McNeill: Saltmarket Centenary-That the Parliament notes that the Saltmarket area in Glasgow Kelvin will celebrate its 100th birthday in 2002; further notes that the Glasgow Cross Tenants and Residents Association are planning activities for the centenary, and expresses its commitment to regenerating inner city areas such as Saltmarket to ensure a quality life for local people so that ordinary people continue to live in city centres and not just shop there. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Ms Sandra White, Andrew Wilson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Rhoda Grant, Michael Matheson, Alex Neil, Mr Michael McMahon
S1M-892 Saltmarket Centenary (lodged on 22 May 2000) Irene Oldfather*
S1M-892 Saltmarket Centenary (lodged on 22 May 2000) Fergus Ewing*
S1M-892 Saltmarket Centenary (lodged on 22 May 2000) Mr John McAllion*

Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Ms Sandra White, Andrew Wilson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Rhoda Grant, Michael Matheson, Alex Neil, Mr Michael McMahon, Irene Oldfather, Fergus Ewing, Mr John McAllion
S1M-892 Saltmarket Centenary (lodged on 22 May 2000) Mike Watson*
